original_title: LOCKDOWN: The Doctor Who Fans' Survival Guide
overview: During the COVID19 pandemic, a call went out to fans of the BBC TV science fiction series DOCTOR WHO to film personal videos of how they coped with being confined in their homes for months on end. Shot on mobile phones, laptops, tablets and cameras …anything they could lay their hands on … the following film is the result. It's an inspiring tale of the indomitable human spirit - all wrapped up in some utterly unique stories and videos!
title: LOCKDOWN: The Doctor Who Fans' Survival Guide
